context: CSN Stores expanded into international markets, shipping to Canada and Germany, selling in UK. Opened London office. Still operating under CSN Stores name before Wayfair rebrand in 2011.

competitors.name: Overstock
competitors.notes: Similar discount home goods model, primary competitor

competitors.name: IKEA
competitors.notes: Swedish furniture giant with US stores and online growth

competitors.name: Bed Bath & Beyond
competitors.notes: Home goods retailer with e-commerce expansion

competitors.name: Williams-Sonoma
competitors.notes: Pottery Barn, West Elm brands online

competitors.name: Crate & Barrel
competitors.notes: Upscale furniture and home goods retailer
